creator: srinivasa.adapa@neustar.com
text:
When I use new XMLParser (xerces.jar) it is complianing about old schema 
specification hint xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/10/XMLSchema" and when I 
change the  value of this to xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" the xml 
data file is being parsed successfully. Apparently, the xml data file is 
inconformance with new 2001 Schema but only the parser is not recoginizing the 
old schema hint. Any guidance is highly appreciated.

This is expected behaviour - Xerces-J is XML Schema REC compliant and expects 
the appropriate namespace definitions
creator: elena@apache.org
